name: Car Strike 3D: Real Mad Driving Simulation
name_original: Car Strike 3D: Real Mad Driving Simulation
description:
Here you Go with New Adventure Mission

Destroy All the enemy Turrets and win the game,enemy has strong fire power , long range missiles are there to defeat you completely , move fast as far as you can and destroy all turrets .Destroy enemy tanks , speed up your car and beat incoming missiles to rescue your car.

***Features***


No internet connection required.
Amazing 3D sports drift car with good fire power.
target those enemy turrets.

Best Mobile adventure game.



Win this adventure game and share with all.
